data.description: Have you ever heard of Gozu? In the realm of Japanese urban legends, the Cow Head is the ultimate taboo. It is said that the story is so terrifying that anyone who hears it will die of shock within three days. In this video, we explore the chilling accounts of those who encountered the fragment of this forbidden knowledge. Why did a whole class of students collapse in a bus? Why does the transcript not exist in any library? This is the secret Japan tried to bury. Watch until the end if you dare, but remember: curiosity killed the cat. What do you think is the real content of the story? Let us know in the comments if you've heard whispers of the Cow Head. Japanese Horror, Urban Legend, Creepy, Supernatural, Mystery, Paranormal Activity.

WARNING: The Story Too Scary To Exist。選定理由：案3は冒頭にWARNINGを配置し、禁じられた知識への渇望を刺激するモバイル最適化タイトルです。The Whispererによる演出：1970年代のバス事件を核に、あらすじを語らず『異常な反応』に焦点を当て、恐怖を増幅させました。The Visionaryによる映像設計：全体を1970年代の質感と現代の解像度をミックスしたVHS調の不気味なトーンで統一しています。
data.vrew_script:
There is a story you must never hear
A legend known as the Cow Head
Those who listen lose their minds forever
In the 1970s a teacher told it on a bus
Students started screaming and shaking in terror
The bus driver lost control of the wheel
When they woke up no one remembered the plot
Only a lingering scent of rotting meat remained
Look closely at the shadows behind you
Something with a human body and a cow head
It is standing right there in the corner
Do not turn around or it will speak
